title: Workspaces Configuration
description: Configuration for workspace projects and their dependencies

injectedProperties.description: Property name to inject that provide values injections into templates.

oneOf.description: The description of the project, shown during create when selecting a project.
An array of strings for an injected property that will override a prompt and be injected into templates.

items.description: A single string within the array of strings that make up the injected property

template.description: The template that should be applied to this project

dependencies.description: Repositories that are dependencies of the project

items.description: Repository name that must match an entry in the repositories section

path.description: Path where the repository should be cloned (relative to the active project)

scripts.description: Scripts to run if there is no package.json file in the repository

oneOf.description: Script to run after the repository is cloned

mac.description: Script to run after the repository is cloned on macOS

lin.description: Script to run after the repository is cloned on Linux

win.description: Script to run after the repository is cloned on Windows

error-on-stderr.description: Whether to throw an error if the script writes to stderr

templates.description: Templates that are available to be used in the projects

inherit.description: Template that should be inherited from

prompts.description: Prompts that will be asked on creation (unless already defined as properties in the project json)

name.description: Name of the prompt (used as the key in the result object)

message.description: Message to display to the user

dropOnCreate.description: If true, the saved value (from the project lock file) will be dropped from being available as a default on new project creates

choices.description: List of choices for select/multiselect/list prompts
